vehicles.description: Ahead is a black medium-sized vehicle (possibly a small tractor or a utility vehicle) occupying the center of the lane. It has a clearly visible carriage number and appears to be traveling in the same direction as our vehicle.
vehicles.explanation: The presence of this vehicle directly affects the driving route and speed of our vehicle. Our vehicle must maintain a safe following distance and be ready to respond to any sudden stops or changes in speed that may occur from this vehicle.

barriers.description: A continuous green construction barrier is set up along the right side of the road, restricting passage.
barriers.explanation: This obstacle indicates an area under construction or closed off to traffic, which narrows the available roads for self-driving vehicles and reinforces the necessity of driving within the marked lanes.

other objects.description: Construction debris and uneven terrain are clearly visible to the left of the traffic cone.
other objects.explanation: Debris may cause damage to one's own vehicle or lead to an unexpected change in its trajectory, therefore, the vehicle should maintain a safe distance from the left side.

Remain vigilant for people near the roadside to prevent them from stepping onto the road and ensure safe passage.

1.description and explanation: A large construction vehicle is present on the road ahead. The vehicle appears to be heavy and sturdy, possibly engaged in transport or construction work, indicated by the robust design and build. The presence of this vehicle influences the ego car's future driving behavior by signaling the need for an increased following distance to maintain a safe stopping gap. Caution should be exercised as construction vehicles can make sudden stops or slow maneuvers. Anticipating potential movements of the construction vehicle, such as turning or backing up, is also important for safe driving.
